about_the_game:
🎉

Welcome to the sugary world of "Crazy Candy dish"

Crazy Candydish sets you on a playfield with colored pieces. These pieces move using 2D physics. When you click on a set of three touching like colors, you remove those pieces from play and gain points. If you can get more than 3 like in a row you will get bonus points. If you can make three matches rapidly, you will also get bonus points. Bonus points can be collected as extra gems at the end of a level.
🍬

Helpful Tools!

You can use gems to buy Spatulas and Mines for 3 gems each. Drag them with your mouse to use them. Spatulas will move pieces that they touch, Mines will destroy anything they touch.
🌈

You are not Alone

As you progress, you will unlock a tongue in cheek story to two sisters trying to find there lost father. You will also encounter hazards such as Bombs, Q-worms and Q-birds. Any candy pieces destroyed by Bombs will subtract from your score. Q -worms will snake in between pieces, breaking connections and preventing matches. Q-birds will eat pieces and remove them from play.
🌟

Satisfy Your Sweet Cravings:

'Crazy Candydish' is a chill adventure meant to give easy access to the flow state and help players relax. 🍭

short_description: Crazy Candydish is a match -3 style puzzle game where colored pieces fall onscreen from 365 degrees and form shapes using 2D Physics. You must make matches and combos to earn bonus points. Earn points to move on through 75 levels.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian
